issue.message: The result of `intersect` is not used. If the rectangles do not intersect, no change is made and the original rectangle is not modified. These methods return false to indicate that this has happened.
Method.invoke requires both an upper and lower SDK bounds checks to be safe, and the upper bound must be below SdkVersionInfo.HIGHEST_KNOWN_API.
